mapper.select: SELECT c.categoryNo, c.categoryName, c.categoryImg, c.highlight FROM store s, category c where s.storeNO = #{storeNo} and s.storeno = c.storeno and c.publicYN = 1 order by c.categoryno asc

SELECT menuNo, menuName, menuDesc, menuPrice, menuImg, discount FROM menu where categoryNo = #{categoryNo} and unitNo is null and menuNo not in (SELECT setNo FROM useMenu) and menuNo not in (select menuNo from promotionMenu)

select.if: SELECT m.menuno, m.menuName, m.menuDesc, m.menuPrice, m.menuImg, m.discount FROM users u, store s, category c, menu m, promotionmenu pm where u.userNo = 1 and u.userNo = s.userNo and s.storeNo = c.storeNo and c.categoryNo = m.categoryNo and (m.menuNo = pm.menuNo or m.discount != 0) GROUP BY m.menuno, m.menuname, m.menuDesc, m.menuPrice, m.menuImg,m.discount
SELECT menuNo, menuName, menuDesc, menuPrice, menuImg, discount FROM menu where isSpecial = 4 or isSpecial = 6

mapper.select: SELECT menuNo, menuName, menuDesc, menuPrice, menuImg, unitNo, discount FROM menu where categoryNo = #{categoryNo} and menuName like #{menuName}||'%' order by menuNo asc
SELECT c.categoryname FROM setUnit su, defaultMenu dm, menu m, category c where su.unitNo = #{unitNo} and su.unitno = dm.unitno and dm.menuNo = m.menuNo and m.categoryNo = c.categoryNo

SELECT t.toppingNo menuNo, t.toppingname menuName, t.toppingprice menuPrice, t.toppingimg menuImg FROM menu m, useTopping ut, topping t where m.menuNo = ut.menuNo and m.menuNo = #{menuNo} and t.toppingNo = ut.toppingNo
SELECT toppingNo, toppingname, toppingPrice FROM topping where storeNo=1

select m.menuimg, m.menuname, m.menuprice from menu m, store s, category c where s.storename='kfc' and s.storeno=c.storeno and c.categoryno=m.categoryno and (m.isspecial=2 or m.isspecial=3 or m.isspecial=6 or m.isspecial=7)
SELECT menuName, menuPrice, menuImg, menuNo FROM menu where menuNo = #{menuNo}
SELECT menuName, menuPrice, menuImg, menuNo FROM menu where categoryNo = #{categoryNo} and isChange = 1 and menuNo != #{menuNo}

SELECT m.menuname, m.menuprice, m.menuImg, m.menuNo, m.categoryNo, c.categoryname FROM defaultMenu dm, menu m, category c where dm.unitNo = #{unitNo} and dm.menuNo = m.menuNo and c.categoryNo = m.categoryNo order by m.menuNo desc
